message.p: Let the symbolic manipulator work in algebraic or numeric mode.
The symbolic package will automatically switch over to numeric calculations whenever a symbolic study is impossible.
Enable/disable numeric testing of the Taylor developments for separatrices.
Number of digits required when checking for zero equality.
Number of digits of numeric precision for all calculations. Use 0 for default double-precision
Default epsilon for separatrices. Can take values from 0.01 to 0.3.
Order of Taylor approximation. This order is increased as long as the separatrice test fails.
Start working numerically when order of Taylor approximation reaches this level.
Maximum order of Taylor approximation. Stop testing separatrices at this order.
